DOC.brief_summary: The goal project conduct pilot study test utility Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) clinical message tool improve reach quality ( fidelity competency ) coach provide behavioral activation ( BA ) strategy mobile mental health app call Personalized Real-time Intervention Motivational Enhancement ( PRIME ) . This study improve reach clinician use NLP-powered messaging tool , ensure fidelity BA model clinician access real-time clinical information patient guide target treatment ( competence ) . If successful , PRIME could operate cost effective tool clinician extend reach accessible treatment population struggle depression .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Feasibility Disseminating Novel Mobile Platform Treat Depression
DOC.criteria: 18 old Read speak English PHQ9 score 5 great indicate depressive symptom interfere daily functioning ( Item 10 PHQ9 > 2 ) . To consistent NIMH RDoC initiative , assess comorbid problem ( substance abuse , anxiety , psychosis ) , exclude participant psychiatric comorbidities Must mobile device iOS Android platforms either WiFi 3G/4G ready ; Under 18 Can read speak English Can attain suitable mobile device
